biocontainers.name: nanosim
biocontainers.summary: NanoSim is a fast and scalable read simulator that captures the technology-specific features of ONT data, and allows for adjustments upon improvement of nanopore sequencing technology.

biotools.summary: Nanopore sequence read simulator based on statistical characterization.

bioschemas.name: NanoSim
bioschemas.summary: Nanopore sequence read simulator based on statistical characterization.
